description:
- Revised and Updated for June 2016 -

Are you struggling to increase your Amazon search rankings for your private label products?

Would you like to learn how Amazon A9 algorithm works so you can overtake your competitors?

Through trial and error, me and my partners identified which product listing elements and promotion types are most important for increasing your keyword rankings on Amazon search results.

Learn how to take your Amazon FBA business to the next level :

► How Amazon's search engine ranks products (The A9 Product Search engine technology)

► How ranking on Amazon is different than ranking on Google and why it's much easier

► The most important fields where you should enter your main product keywords in order to get the most impact on rankings

► The big mistake about "Search Terms" fields explained

► How to find the best converting keywords for your specific product

► How to correctly categorize your product and avoid being excluded from search results!

► The Search/Buy method

► On which performance metrics you should focus

► What you should stop doing IMMEDIATELY! Amazon changed the ToS. Which tactics you should eliminate now and save your account from being banned from Amazon.

► HOT Product Opportunity Ideas UPDATED MONTHLY!

► And much more VALUABLE and IN-DEPTH information in the discussion section and announcements...

My lectures are short and to the point! I VALUE YOUR TIME! Highly valuable & actionable content that you can apply right away!!!

INCLUDED:

- Fast and personal support. Ask me anything about your Amazon business.

- Updates and announcements that will make sure that you stay informed about new policy changes and strategies.


Click "Take This Course" button to learn how to increase your keyword rankings on Amazon!

Talk to you inside :)
title: Amazon SEO Optimization 2.0 For FBA Private Label Products
